name: flash-cards-dockerized
description: Dockerized version of the flash-cards application (api and frontend)

scripts.dev: npm run dev:api:up && npm run dev:app:up
scripts.start: cd docker && docker-compose up -d nginx && cd ..
scripts.dev:down: npm run dev:api:down && npm run app:down
scripts.dev:api:up: cd api && npm run redis:up && npm run db:up && cd ..
scripts.dev:app:up: cd docker && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d client && cd ..
scripts.dev:api:down: npm run dev:api:backup && cd api && npm run db:down && npm run redis:stop && cd ..
scripts.dev:api:backup: cd api && npm run db:backup && cd ..
scripts.dev:api:restore: cd api && npm run db:restore && cd ..
